mapper.insert: INSERT INTO data (kvstable, kvskey, object) VALUES(#{kvstable}, #{key}, #{object, javaType=byte[], jdbcType=BLOB, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.ByteArrayTypeHandler})
INSERT INTO stringfield (kvstable, kvskey, name, value) VALUES (#{kvstable}, #{key}, #{name}, #{value})
mapper.select: SELECT object FROM data WHERE kvskey = #{key} AND kvstable = #{kvstable}
SELECT name, value FROM stringfield WHERE kvskey = #{key} AND kvstable = #{kvstable}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM data WHERE kvskey = #{key} AND kvstable = #{kvstable}
DELETE FROM stringfield WHERE kvskey = #{key} AND kvstable = #{kvstable}
